name: Only 2 Remain
description:
(IF THE GAME DOESNT LOAD ON BROWSER THEN DOWNLOAD THE GAME)

Complete walkthrough

Approximate playtime: 15 minutes

This game was made for "Dying MMO Jam" in 15 days.

You recently got the news that the MMO you used to play as a kid is getting shutdown today. You find yourself playing it again only to find out theres only one player online.

All treasure locations:

Controls:

Hold right click - move towards the cursor
